data_source_validation.notes: All API calls successful. PAA data from Level 1 + Level 2 nested questions. Content parsing extracted from all 3 Top-3 URLs.

search_intent.content_strategy: Marketplace-focused guide with commercial product listings + informational content about Haflinger breed characteristics and pricing. Hybrid approach: Educational content about buying process + marketplace integration.

must_have_topics.evidence: All Top 10 mention pricing (median 4,900€, range 850€-20,000€). PAA: 'Wie viel kostet ein guter Haflinger?'
PAA: 'Ist ein Haflinger ein gutes Anfängerpferd?' + 'Sind Haflinger Anfängerpferde?' Multiple sources confirm ideal beginner horse
Gutmütig, menschenbezogen, intelligent, arbeitsfreudig, aber auch stur wenn nicht richtig geführt
PAA: 'Kann ein Haflinger 90 kg tragen?' Shows high buyer concern about weight capacity
Origin in South Tyrol, 1874 founding, breed standards, modern sport vs. classic types
PAA: 'Wie lange lebt ein Haflinger?' Answer: 25-30 years, some up to 40 years
Gebirgspferd, trittsicher, breiter Rücken, bestimmtes Erscheinungsbild (helle Mähne, Fuchs)

differentiation_opportunities.topic: Haflinger Kaufprozess: Worauf achten beim Kauf
differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Step-by-step buying checklist with veterinary health checks, price verification, contract templates (only ehorses briefly mentions)
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: High commercial intent + beginner audience = need practical buying guide they don't get from marketplace listings

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Complete cost breakdown: purchase price variations (850€-20,000€ by type) + monthly care costs + equipment needed + insurance
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: ehorses shows only median price, not total cost analysis. Buyers search 'haflinger kaufen günstig' - need realistic cost guide

differentiation_opportunities.topic: Haflinger Züchter vs. Privatverkauf vs. Marketplace
differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Pros/cons comparison: breeder quality guarantee vs. private savings vs. marketplace selection. Trust & verification tips.
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: SERP shows many marketplaces but no comparison guide. Beginners don't know which channel is safest/best value

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Veterinary inspection requirements, what to check (hooves, teeth, eyes, movement), genetic issues (SCC eye cancer), hip dysplasia
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: PAA reveals health concerns but Top 10 doesn't address vet inspection step-by-step. Critical for beginner protection.

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Clarify the Edelbluthaflinger variant (Arab cross), differences, pricing, suitability for different riders
differentiation_opportunities.reasoning: Marketplace listings show both types but no educational comparison. Beginners confused about variants.

completely_missing.source: No SERP or PAA coverage despite commercial intent
completely_missing.reason: High-intent keyword + expensive purchase = financing guides are valuable. Not covered by any Top 10 result.

completely_missing.source: No SERP or PAA coverage despite practical buyer need
completely_missing.reason: Haflinger.eu mentions 'artgerechte Tiertransporte' but no guide. Buyers need transport cost estimates.
Legal/consumer protection topic for marketplace purchases. Not covered despite beginner audience needing protection.
Beginners vulnerable to scams. Deine-Tierwelt mentions 'geprüfte Anzeigen' but no fraud prevention guide.

rank_1_analysis.title: Haflinger, Pferde & Zubehör gebraucht kaufen
unique_angles: 254 active Haflinger listings with price range (1€-11,500€)
Regional filtering by German state (Bayern: 55, Niedersachsen: 41)
Multi-category filtering (Großpferde, Kleinpferde & Ponys, Privat, Gewerblich)
rank_1_analysis.key_differentiator: Volume + regional targeting + simple marketplace interface
rank_1_analysis.eeat_signals: Established marketplace, trusted by users, but minimal E-E-A-T expertise

format_recommendations.word_count_notes: Based on ehorses (2,200+ words with multiple sections) and haflinger.eu (1,800+ words). Kleinanzeigen is marketplace, not comparable. Target: 2,500-2,800 words for comprehensive guide.

required_sections.h2: Haflinger Pferde - Das solltest du vor dem Kauf wissen
required_sections.description: Introduction to the breed, why they're popular, key characteristics

required_sections.h2: Was kostet ein Haflinger? - Komplette Kostenübersicht
required_sections.description: Median price (4,900€), price range (850€-20,000€), factors affecting price, total cost of ownership

required_sections.h2: Ist ein Haflinger das richtige Anfängerpferd für dich?
required_sections.description: Haflinger characteristics (gutmütig, intelligent, arbeitswillig), suitability for beginners, what beginners need to know

required_sections.h2: Haflinger Gewichtskapazität - Wieviel kannst du wiegen?
required_sections.description: Weight capacity guidelines, factors affecting capacity, different Haflinger types
Where to buy (marketplace, breeders, private), what to check, veterinary inspection checklist
Purchase price breakdown by type, monthly care costs (feed, vet, farrier), equipment needed

required_sections.h2: Züchter vs. Marketplace vs. Privatverkauf - Welcher Weg?
required_sections.description: Pros/cons of each channel, trust verification, quality guarantees, cost differences
Required health checks, genetic issues to screen for (SCC, dysplasia), what a good inspection includes
Life expectancy (25-30 years, up to 40), long-term care planning, health maintenance

required_sections.h2: FAQ: Die häufigsten Fragen zum Haflinger-Kauf
required_sections.description: Answers to PAA questions from SERP

visual_elements: pricing_table (price ranges by Haflinger type: standard, Edelbluthaflinger, different ages)
cost_breakdown_table (purchase + monthly costs: feed, vet, farrier, insurance)
checklist (buying checklist: health, documents, price verification, contract)
comparison_table (breeder vs. marketplace vs. private: pros/cons, cost, quality)
format_recommendations.featured_snippet_topic: Haflinger Kaufprozess Schritte / Worauf achten beim Kauf
format_recommendations.featured_snippet_format: Numbered list (5-7 items) of buying steps or criteria to check

competitor_landscape.analysis: MARKETPLACE-DOMINATED SERP - Unique constraint requiring content strategy adjustment

domain_authority_distribution.notes: Kleinanzeigen (#1), ehorses (#2), haflinger.eu (#3) are extremely high authority. Mixed with breed association sites.

domain_breakdown.rank_2: ehorses.de - Niche marketplace (250 listings) + Educational content

competitor_landscape.assessment: SERP is marketplace-dominated. Rank 1-2 are pure listing platforms with no educational content. Our opportunity: Create comprehensive BUYING GUIDE that educates + converts to marketplace integration. Cannot outrank marketplaces for 'haflinger kaufen' in pure marketplace results. Strategy: Position as GUIDE to using marketplaces safely, then link to/integrate with marketplaces.
competitor_landscape.strategic_recommendation: Hybrid content strategy: Educational guide (70%) + Marketplace comparison/integration (30%). Target users who want to understand BEFORE searching marketplaces.

eeat_signals.credentials_reasoning: ehorses content shows vet expertise, breed knowledge. Breeders show 40+ years Haflinger experience. Must position as experienced horse buyer advisor.
case_study_topics: Successful Haflinger purchase: beginner's journey from research to riding
Cost reality: what one buyer actually spent (purchase + first year)
Health scare avoided: importance of vet inspection (example of problem found, saved buyer)
reference_types: South Tirol Haflinger Breed Registry (official standards)
Veterinary health standards for horse purchases
data_sources: ehorses marketplace data (250+ listings, pricing analysis)

paa_integration.question: Wie viel kostet ein guter Haflinger?
paa_integration.section_placement: Was kostet ein Haflinger? - Komplette Kostenübersicht
paa_integration.reasoning: Primary buyer question. Must answer with 4,900€ median, 850€-20,000€ range, factors affecting price.

paa_integration.question: Ist ein Haflinger ein gutes Anfängerpferd?
paa_integration.section_placement: Ist ein Haflinger das richtige Anfängerpferd für dich?
paa_integration.reasoning: Primary buyer concern. ehorses answer: 'ideal für Anfänger' but must add caveat about horse intelligence/testing reiter

paa_integration.question: Kann ein Haflinger 90 kg tragen?
paa_integration.section_placement: Haflinger Gewichtskapazität - Wieviel kannst du wiegen?
paa_integration.reasoning: Specific buyer concern. Answer: Yes for most, depends on type/training. Explains larger vs. smaller Haflinger variants.

paa_integration.question: Wie lange lebt ein Haflinger?
paa_integration.reasoning: Long-term ownership question. Answer: 25-30 years typically, some to 40 years. Important for commitment decision.

paa_integration.question: Was ist das besondere an einem Haflinger?
paa_integration.section_placement: Haflinger Pferde - Das solltest du vor dem Kauf wissen
paa_integration.reasoning: Differentiator question. Answer: Mountain horse (robust, sure-footed), distinctive appearance, versatile use.

paa_integration.question: Sind Haflinger für Anfänger geeignet?
paa_integration.section_placement: Ist ein Haflinger das richtige Anfängerpferd für dich?
paa_integration.reasoning: Confidence question. Answer: Yes if beginner commits to proper training/handling. No if expecting 'push-button' horse.

paa_integration.question: Kann ich mit 100kg reiten?
paa_integration.section_placement: Haflinger Gewichtskapazität - Wieviel kannst du wiegen?
paa_integration.reasoning: Heavy rider specific concern. Answer: Possible with heavy-type Haflinger, but requires consideration & proper horse selection.

paa_integration.question: Welche Gesundheitsprobleme haben Haflingerpferde?
paa_integration.reasoning: Critical for beginner protection. Answer: SCC (eye cancer), dysplasia rare but possible. Explains screening importance.

paa_integration.question: Was ist das beste Anfängerpferd?
paa_integration.section_placement: Ist ein Haflinger das richtige Anfängerpferd für dich?
paa_integration.reasoning: Broader question but useful for differentiating Haflinger. Answer: Haflinger ranked highly with Isländer, Welsh Cob, Fjordpferd.

breakdown.paa_coverage: 9/10 - 10 questions (5 L1 + 5 L2) covering all major buyer concerns
breakdown.content_parsing: 9/10 - All 3 Top URLs parsed successfully, word count estimated
breakdown.must_have_topics: 9/10 - 7 topics identified with clear coverage metrics
breakdown.eeat_signal_mapping: 8/10 - Clear credential requirements and reference types identified
breakdown.format_recommendations: 9/10 - Specific section structure with 10 H2s + visual elements

constraints_identified: MARKETPLACE DOMINANCE: Top 5 results are marketplace listings, not content. Strategy must be 'guide to using marketplaces' not 'rank above marketplaces'
LOW COMMERCIAL INTENT FOR CONTENT: Primary searcher intent is to find listings, not to read guides. Must position as complementary educational resource.
REGIONAL VARIATIONS: Strong secondary keywords for regional searches (Bayern, Niedersachsen). Consider regional content strategy.
